column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Heriberto - Thank you for your review. If you spend a little time in Midtown
column2: you'll find that the parking garage next to JINYA is one of the only free parking garages in the area. It's not perfect
column4: this is what happens when demand exceeds supply in parts of our fair city. We appreciate your understanding regarding our extended wait times during peak hours. Please know that we have five other JINYA locations in the greater Houston area
column5: none of which are quite so busy as Midtown. But regardless
column6: we are most grateful for your visit
column7: and we thank you for your patronage.
